description: This bacteria is an advantageous good engineerable chassis because it can respond to several quorum sensing molecule.
genotype_description: JMH626 is a V. harveyiΔcqsAΔluxQΔluxN mutant that does not produce Vh-CAI-1 due to the cqsA mutation. In addition, JMH626 does not detect HAI-1 and AI-2 because it lacks both the LuxN and LuxQ receptors = no quorum sensing molecule production
growth: As Vibrio harveyi is a bacteria found in sea water, it can not survive without salt in the medium. LB can be enough but Luria Marine is better.
